item.title: Members only tele command
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“D4rkscape, post:6, topic:275226”]i would have changed just a lil and said…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“teleport”) && isMember == 1) {
teleportToX = X;
teleportToY = Y;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“You must be a member to teleport here.”);
} else if(teleblock) {
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport.”);
}[/quote]
please use the correct format [/code
